document_data.name: Blade Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Blade Lane''' was one of the easternmost streets in [[Suzail]] that ran parallel to [[Torch Street]] to the west.
document_data.Description: Blade Lane began on [[Coachwheels Way]], moved south while curving west, until reaching its end on the street that housed the [[The Market Hall (Suzail)|Market Hall]] of Suzail and the print shop â€“ [[Tavernant's Tellings]].{{Cite dungeon/198/Backdrop: Suzail|65-66}}
